suspiciously.translation[0].definitions[: in a way that shows you think someone has done something wrong or dishonest
‘What do you want it for?’ he asked suspiciously.
in a way that makes people think that something bad or illegal is happening
He saw two youths acting suspiciously.
He seemed to be taking a suspiciously long time.
This sounded suspiciously like an attempt to get rid of me.
in a way that shows you do not trust something or someone
